resources.string: Your objective is to kill the Assassin(s).
Your objective is to kill everything and everyone.
You can revive whoever you want by resting your hand on that player\'s shoulder for 3 seconds.
When you die, you can heal other players around you with a wink.
Tap twice on the back of another player, and he is forced to raise the knife if he is the Assassin.
You can transform into another character by placing both hands on another live player\'s shoulders. The player will whisper a character of their own.
You can transform into another character by placing 2 hands on another dead player\'s shoulders. The player will whisper a character of their own.
If you are killed by the Assassin, you resurrect and become a 2nd Assassin.
If you can make sense of the Assassin that you\'re the Accomplice, he can lend you his face.
Tens the power to merge as souls of 2 other players. That is, when one of them dies, the other dies too.
When you exchange pistols with another player, promote him to the Police, so there are 2 Police in the game.
With a handshake, you start a partnership with another player. When you die he can heal you, or vice versa.
You only have one goal: Get killed by the police.
This name has already been chosen
You have to select at least 3 characters
